summary: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.
cast: Marlon Wayans|Marlene Forte|Essence Atkins|David Koechner|Dave Sheridan|Nick Swardson|Alanna Ubach|Andrew Daly|J.B. Smoove|Robin Thede|Jordenn Thompson|Affion Crockett|Cedric the Entertainer|Damien Bray|Joel Kelley Dauten|Bobbie Lee Jr.|Liana Mendoza|Jamie Noel
title: Paranormal Movie
